comments:
I have had problems with my vanilla install of Eclipse Europa CDT 3.3 (using vanilla SUN 1.5 vm)

Every time I build/autobuild my project, I get one or two error dilogues popping up with the following message:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
An internal error occured during: "C/C++ Indexer"
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------


I have dug out the log entries that accompagnies this error:

After some old fashioned sherlock holmes activity and kind assistance from the very helpful #eclipes IRC channel i managed to figure out the most likely cause: The custom make script for my project will pipe text into one cpp and one hpp file the project. (its a crude form of version number  management). The indexer then gets in trouble because the file is probably erased, or only half good when it is indexed.


The offending part of my make script looks like this:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

build_stats: 
	@echo "Generating BuildStats.hpp for automatic versioning"
	@echo "//This file is automagically generated during make."									> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "//All changes to this file will be lost at the next build."						>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "#ifndef HDR_BUILD_STATS_HPP"																>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "#define HDR_BUILD_STATS_HPP"																>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "#define	O2WS_BUILD_NUMBER		\"$(shell expr ${O2WS_BUILD_NO} + 1 )\""			>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "#define	O2WS_BUILD_DATE		\"$(shell date +%Y.%m.%d-%H:%M:%S )\""				>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "#define	O2WS_BUILD_HOST		\"$(shell uname -n )\""									>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "#define	O2WS_BUILD_MACHINE	\"$(shell uname -o -r -m )\""							>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "//Forward references"																			>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "extern const char *o2ws_build_number;"													>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "extern const char *o2ws_build_date;"														>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "extern const char *o2ws_build_host;"														>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "extern const char *o2ws_build_machine;"													>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "#endif"																								>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "//HDR_BUILD_STATS_HPP"																		>> BuildStats.$(HdrSuf)
	@echo "Generating BuildStats.cpp for automatic versioning"
	@echo "//This file is automagically generated during make."									> BuildStats.$(SrcSuf)
	@echo "//All changes to this file will be lost at the next build."						>> BuildStats.$(SrcSuf)
	@echo "#include \"BuildStats.hpp\"" 																>> BuildStats.$(SrcSuf)
	@echo "const char *  o2ws_build_number=	O2WS_BUILD_NUMBER;"								>> BuildStats.$(SrcSuf)
	@echo "const char *  o2ws_build_date=		O2WS_BUILD_DATE;"									>> BuildStats.$(SrcSuf)
	@echo "const char *  o2ws_build_host=		O2WS_BUILD_HOST;"									>> BuildStats.$(SrcSuf)
	@echo "const char *  o2ws_build_machine=	O2WS_BUILD_MACHINE;"								>> BuildStats.$(SrcSuf)
	@touch Version.$(HdrSuf) Version.$(SrcSuf)



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
